infobox.Japanese title:: レンタカー制御不能!  (Rentakā Seigyo Funō!)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Ninzaburo Shiratori  Miwako Sato  Kazunobu Chiba  Detective Horita  Unnamed officer  Unnamed officer
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Kazuhiko Inoue as Ninzaburo Shiratori  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Katsumi Toriumi as Jiro Matsumiya  Masafumi Kimura as Police radio voice A  Masahito Kawanago as Police radio voice B

sections.Situation: Kogoro takes Ran and Conan to an onsen in a rental car after being given a special deal. Kogoro then receives a call from Inspector Megure who reveals that a bomber called the police station to tell them a bomb was placed on Kogoro's car and will detonate when his speed goes below 20 km/h. Kogoro concludes the man who gave him the deal is the bomber.
sections.People:
- Mysterious Man
- Bomber
- Deceased (3 years ago)
sections.Resolution:
Conan impersonates Megure's voice and calls Kogoro and reveals the bomber to be Jirou Matsumiya. Conan explains that Jirou's older brother Ichirou Matsumiya was involved in a case Kogoro worked on three years prior.

The police order a semi truck specially designed to hold cars and hoists Kogoro's car into it. The truck keeps the car still while allowing the wheels to turn giving them time to refuel the car and disarm the bomb. Megure along with Kogoro come to arrest Jirou much to his surprise, they reveal the trick they used to save Kogoro and disarm the bomb.
sections.Trivia:
- Kogoro's car is a purple Toyota Crown Royal [S180] with license plate 9-18.
- The semi-truck is a 2000 Hino Super Dolphin Profia SH with car carrier trailer attached.
- The culprit's car is a solid red Subaru Impreza WRX STI GDB-F.
- Megure and Chiba's car is 2001 Sonic Silver Metallic Nissan Skyline 250GT [V35] Police has a license plate of 33-19.
- Ichiro's motorcycle was a red 2000 Honda VFR800Fi.
- The police motorcycles are 2001 Honda VFR 800 Ps.
- The police cars are 2002 Nissan Elgrand [E51] Police.
